skillInfoWorkSkill: Work Skill: Gain 2$ whenever you place a worker in the Work area
skillInfoCardSkill: Card skill: Draw a card whenever you place a worker in the Work area
skillInfo5VP: Get 5VP if you won at least one item from each category at the end of the game
skillInfoBottle: Bottle: Immediately gain a new bottle. You may use it this quarter
skillInfoAuction: Auction Income: Gain $1 whenever an auction is started by any player
skillInfo1VP: Gain 1 extra VP for each item you own of the specific category at the end of the game
isNowLeading: is now leading the auction with a:
fourthWorkLabel: Draw one card to hand, become first player
fifthWorkLabel: Draw one card to hand and get an income card
lastPlayerCanChange: The last player can change rounds when finished with his or her move.
invite: Invite other players with this link:
